name: Penns Woods Bancorp, Inc.
description: Penns Woods Bancorp, Inc. is a financial services holding company based in the United States, primarily focused on providing a range of banking and financial products through its subsidiaries. Established in 1902, Penns Woods Bancorp operates primarily through its flagship institution, Jersey Shore State Bank, which serves communities in central Pennsylvania. The company offers a variety of services, including personal and commercial banking, mortgage lending, and investment services, aiming to meet the diverse financial needs of its customers. With a commitment to community banking, Penns Woods Bancorp emphasizes personalized service and customer relationships, fostering trust and loyalty among its client base. The company is dedicated to supporting local economies, participating in community development initiatives, and providing financial education to its customers. Additionally, Penns Woods Bancorp focuses on leveraging technology to enhance customer experiences, offering online banking and mobile services that align with modern banking expectations. The company is committed to maintaining strong capital levels and managing its resources effectively to ensure sustained growth and profitability while adhering to regulatory standards. With a strong track record and a focus on community involvement, Penns Woods Bancorp continues to expand its presence and enhance its offerings in the competitive banking landscape.

seo.meta_title: Penns Woods Bancorp, Inc. | Community Banking & Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Penns Woods Bancorp, Inc., a community-focused financial services company providing banking, loans, and investment services in Pennsylvania.

faq.question: What services does Penns Woods Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: Penns Woods Bancorp offers personal and commercial banking, mortgage lending, and investment services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Penns Woods Bancorp?
faq.answer: W. Thomas McGowan is the CEO of Penns Woods Bancorp, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Penns Woods Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Penns Woods Bancorp is headquartered in Williamsport, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: When was Penns Woods Bancorp founded?
faq.answer: Penns Woods Bancorp was founded in 1902.
